title: [K-12] Language Learning Projects with Generative AI: Theory and Practice

context.prior_knowledge: Basic smartphone usage and digital literacy
context.additional_context: Learners primarily use smartphones as learning tools and participate in language-learning projects utilizing generative AI. The educational institution is a nonprofit community education center, with learners aiming to improve language skills necessary for daily life.

learning_goals: Explain the basic functionalities of generative AI tools and their application methods in language learning.
Produce at least three personalized language learning contents using generative AI.
Compare AI-generated feedback with peer assessments to propose effective language learning strategies.

resources: Free generative AI tools (chatbots, translators, etc.)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
